properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 8 at 9:42PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW POSSIBLE FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
the potential for heavy snow Friday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 to
16 inches possible.

* WHERE...Leavenworth, Mazama, Winthrop, Stehekin, Blewett Pass,
Loup Loup Pass, Plain, and Holden Village.

* WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas
of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The
hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
